Reviews.Title: “chic new york urban style”
Reviews.Author: Tim H
Reviews.Content: superb location friendly welcoming coming home staying hotel catches eyes walk hotel wonderful color scheme feel home instantly forget visit restaurant evening cosy fireplace winter time wonderful courtyard terrace imagine nice summer time excellent choice looking forward soon

Reviews.Title: “A bit too much design and too little common sense!”

Reviews.Content: sister hotel hotel amano corner ive bit bit boutique description kept dark clublounge feel heres whats wrong design look unfortunately missed reception girls sitting desk laptops month staff speed bit amateurish considering wasnt day theres elevator bunch people enroute youre waiting time lift construction didnt chance blocked time necessarily easy move bed ok showers theyre squeezed else cramped example couldnt closet standing bed weird accepted layout 4th floor facing street hear bit noise cars central heating air conditioning unfortunately set temperature time drops below fan goes super annoyingly loud woke time sprang youre light sleeper bring ear plugs anyway fairly cheap location perfect youre mitte meeting startup crowd plus free wireless theyre subway entrance couple steps taxi stand easy travel finally girls reception amano cater requests jumping lady clue crash id price hotels offering similar deals actually spend time id recommend slightly larger
